Title: Razor Reports - a Visualizer for the DotNetNuke Reports Module
Description: Razor Reports is a visualizer plugin for the DotNetNuke Reports module. In addition to HTML and XSLT templates, Razor Results allows to develop templates in C#/VB Razor syntax. It integrates the script editor and the settings controls from DotNetNuke Razor Host Module.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Razor Reports is a visualizer plugin for the DotNetNuke Reports module. In addition to HTML and XSLT templates, Razor Results allows to develop templates in C#/VB Razor syntax. It integrates the script editor and the settings controls from DotNetNuke Razor Host Module.

This is an entry of the DotNetNuke Razor Hackethon.
This plugin can also be seen as blueprint for further integrations into other DotNetNuke extensions like Form and List or the XML module.


I also prepared a demo page at http://cullnet.de/razorreports
